howToGetNickname: How can I get the nickname?
nicknameDescription:
The nickname is determined based on your participation in the most types of quizzes and your excellence in gathering points and answering the highest number of questions correctly to achieve the best results.

Note: The Explorer is someone who seeks their interests in the quiz sections but has not yet completed a specific test.
